backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend managing high scores, player profiles, XP/level progression with steep thresholds, and session stats; enforces access control and sanitizes input on score submission.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state (with `xpThresholds`) to new actor state (with `hardXPThresholds`), preserving high scores and player profiles while replacing the XP threshold array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that `frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts` was updated to mirror the new backend XP thresholds for consistent level/XP display in the PlayerProfile screen.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing changes to components, hooks, and utilities across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing screen navigation (menu, game, gameover, leaderboard, controls, profile) and passing game result state between screens.
frontend/src/components/ControlsScreen.t: Controls reference screen component that displays a styled list of keyboard/mouse bindings with a back button.
frontend/src/components/Game/DesertEnvir: Renders the full desert game environment including procedurally generated intact and ruined buildings, sand/sky shader meshes, palm trees, a Pack-a-Punch machine, and a mountain barrier ring using toon shading materials.
frontend/src/components/Game/EnemyMesh.t: Renders animated 3D zombie enemy meshes with walking, hit-flash, and death-fade animations using toon materials, supporting multiple enemy types and player-facing rotation.
frontend/src/components/Game/FirstPerson: Implements first-person player movement with WASD/sprint/jump controls, mouse-look, gravity, and AABB-based collision detection against buildings, mountains, and the Pack-a-Punch machine.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameScene.t: Orchestrates the main game loop by composing the 3D scene, player camera, weapon system, enemy system, wave system, audio, raycasting hit detection, and HUD overlays into a single Canvas-based scene.
frontend/src/components/Game/HUD.tsx: Renders the in-game heads-up display including health bar, ammo counter with weapon tier indicator, crosshair, score, wave info, kill streak, damage flash, points notifications, and Pack-a-Punch proximity prompt.
frontend/src/components/Game/MountainBar: Renders a procedural rocky mountain ring barrier using distorted cone, box, and icosahedron geometries with seeded RNG for deterministic variation and realistic stone color palettes.
frontend/src/components/Game/MuzzleFlash: Displays a brief animated muzzle flash sphere at a given position that fades and shrinks over 80ms when the `active` prop is triggered.
frontend/src/components/Game/PackAPunchM: Renders an animated Pack-a-Punch upgrade machine with pulsing glow, screen flicker, floating particles, and tier-based color changes (purple/blue/gold).
frontend/src/components/Game/PalmTree.ts: Procedurally generates a palm tree with a tapered, ring-bumped trunk, drooping fronds, and a coconut cluster using seeded RNG for per-tree variation.
frontend/src/components/Game/PauseOverla: Renders a styled full-screen pause menu overlay with a resume button and ESC hint.
Renders a floating, rotating health or ammo pickup mesh that detects proximity to the player and triggers collection callbacks when within range.
frontend/src/components/Game/ToonMateria: Provides React hooks that create and cache custom Three.js shader materials for toon shading and back-face outline rendering.
frontend/src/components/Game/WaveOverlay: Displays a styled HUD overlay showing wave countdown, boss warnings, or wave-cleared messages based on the current wave phase state.
frontend/src/components/Game/WeaponViewM: Renders 3D first-person weapon view models (pistol and others) in React Three Fiber with toon shading, recoil animation, and tiered upgrade glow/sparkle effects.
frontend/src/components/GameOver.tsx: Displays the game over screen with session stats (score, wave, kills, headshots), submits stats to the backend for authenticated users, and allows leaderboard score submission.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Renders the top scores leaderboard fetched via useLeaderboard, showing rank, player name, score, and wave with styled rank indicators for the top three entries.
frontend/src/components/MainMenu.tsx: Renders the main menu UI with navigation buttons (play, leaderboard, controls, profile) and an Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out button in the top-right corner.
frontend/src/components/PlayerProfile.ts: Displays the authenticated player's profile including level, XP progress bar, and lifetime stats (kills, headshots, shots fired, total points) fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnemySystem.ts: Manages enemy state including spawning, damage, death, pickups, score, and points notifications. Provides callbacks for spawning waves of standard/boss enemies and handling headshot bonuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameAudio.ts: Wraps synthesized audio functions into memoized callbacks for game events such as gunshots, zombie sounds, player hits, pickups, and wave transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches the high score leaderboard from the backend actor and exposes a mutation to submit a new score, using React Query for caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching/creating a player profile and updating it with session stats, scoped to the authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useWaveSystem.ts: Controls wave progression through phases (menu, countdown, active, cleared, gameover), managing countdown timers and triggering enemy spawns with scaling difficulty per wave.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeaponSystem.ts: Manages weapon state including firing, reloading, recoil, weapon switching via keyboard, and upgrade tiers with damage multipliers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up a desert Borderlands-themed design system using Tailwind, custom OKLCH color tokens, and Bangers/Oswald Google Fonts, with reusable component classes like toon-btn and toon-panel.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/shaders/sandShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a procedural sand/dune terrain, using value noise for vertex displacement and warm sandy color blending with stripe patterns in the fragment shader.
frontend/src/shaders/skyShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a desert sky dome, blending burnt orange at the horizon to deep red-purple at the zenith with a sun glow effect near the horizon.
frontend/src/shaders/toonShader.ts: GLSL shaders implementing a Borderlands-style cel/toon shading with 4-step posterized diffuse lighting, rim light, hit flash effect, and a solid dark outline pass.
frontend/src/types/enemy.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Enemy (position, health, attack, state flags) and Pickup (health/ammo collectibles) entities used in the game.
frontend/src/types/weapon.ts: TypeScript type definitions and configuration constants for the three weapons (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle), including fire rate, damage, ammo, upgrade tiers, and costs.
frontend/src/utils/audioSynthesis.ts: Web Audio API utility that procedurally synthesizes sound effects (gunshots for pistol, shotgun, and assault rifle; zombie growl) using noise buffers, oscillators, and filters without any audio asset files.
frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts: Frontend utility mirroring the backend XP/level progression logic for levels 1â€“55, with helper functions to calculate current level, XP thresholds, and percentage progress toward the next level.
frontend/src/utils/proceduralGeometry.ts: Procedural geometry utilities that deterministically generate building/ruin/barrier layout data and collision AABBs for the arena, plus mountain ring segment data for the perimeter, using a seeded RNG.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting, persisting, and cleaning URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors, fonts, shadows, animations) for a comic/toon-styled FPS game UI, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing features, pending feature requests (AR-1, AR-2) to significantly increase XP thresholds per player level, and architectural metadata for an FPS Zombie Shooter.
